tool_description: Tesla News API is an API that allows investors to access news and information about Tesla, Inc., a company that designs and manufactures electric vehicles, energy storage systems, and solar products. This API can be used to retrieve news articles and other information from a variety of news sources. It provides a simple and easy-to-use interface,for accessing up-to-date information about the company and its products, making it a valuable resource for anyone interested in investing in the elec...
name: Tesla_News_APi
title: Tesla_News_APi

api_list.name: Get all Tesla News From Top Financial News Sites
api_list.description: It refers to gathering news articles and updates on the electric vehicle company, Tesla, from reputable and reliable financial news sources. These sources provide in-depth coverage of Tesla's financial performance, operational developments, strategic moves, and impact on the automotive industry. By collecting news from top financial news sites, one can stay informed about the latest updates and expert analysis on the company, and gain a comprehensive understanding of Tesla's current situation and future prospects.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tesla_news_api.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tesla_news_api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tesla_news_api.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tesla_news_api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
